Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, his alter ego Duke, and sets up the initial mystery involving suspicious men and an underwater threat, leading to a rooftop confrontation and hospital visit.

sub_scenes.title: Cover and Initial Setup
sub_scenes.description: The comic cover introduces the Human Meteor and hints at an underwater adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke takes fares to the waterfront and notices he is being followed, leading to his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers
The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Cop Shooters
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts individuals labeled as 'cop shooters' and engages in a rooftop fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Underwater Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the plan to investigate the yacht, Toby's stowaway mission, and the unfolding underwater conspiracy involving a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Planning the Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby devise a plan to infiltrate the yacht to investigate the submarine conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Events unfold on the yacht as crew members discuss stops and Pete discovers a depth chart with marked locations.

sub_scenes.title: Toby Overboard and Duke's Premonition
sub_scenes.description: Toby is thrown overboard, Duke senses something is wrong, and the yacht crew decides to contact Duke confirming the submarine connection.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Investigation and Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives underwater, discovers the sunken submarine, encounters divers, and the submarine crew prepares for action.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor is attacked by divers, the submarine attempts escape, and Human Meteor is propelled to the surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Intervention and Yacht Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Namor's attack on the submarine and ship, followed by Duke's return to the yacht and the discovery of Peter's treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Namor Attacks Submarine and Ship
sub_scenes.description: Namor surfaces and attacks both the submarine and a ship, disrupting their operations.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Return and Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes underwater action, returns to the yacht, discovers Peter's death and his treachery through the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby finalize their mission, visit Holden in the hospital, and Duke returns home, concluding the immediate storyline.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads in a battle scenario and transitions to a domestic scene with an ambulance arriving at a house.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Action
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are depicted fighting 'Nazi fiends' in a war-like setting.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Man
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house and an injured man being carried inside.

Major_Arcs.title: The Wallet, Bronson's Disguise, and Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' discovery of a dropped wallet, their encounter with Major Bronson in disguise, and their escalating involvement in a dangerous conspiracy at a bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Visit
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet near the ambulance and decide to return it to the bus company garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase

sub_scenes.title: Bronson in Disguise and Garage Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys witness a Marine saluting a civilian who is revealed to be Major Bronson in disguise near the garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Reception and Ominous Wait
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage, are led inside, and instructed to wait for Mr. Horst, leading to a suspenseful moment.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Ruse, and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys while Bronson plots a deadly scheme involving carbon monoxide.

sub_scenes.title: Uprising and Bronson's Violent Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, Mr. Horst threatens the boys, and Bronson violently intervenes, shooting someone.

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Unveiling Sabotage Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' separate attempts to seek help, Skip's discovery of a secret office and sabotage plans, and the arrival of Marines to intervene.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Help
sub_scenes.description: Chuck seeks help from a Marine Sergeant while Skip goes to find help separately.

sub_scenes.title: Secret Office and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Skip discovers a secret office and uncovers sabotage plans, learning about a foreign conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Breach and Office Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Marines are alerted, a car crashes into the barracks, and a confrontation ensues inside the office.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Arrival, Major's Injury, and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, a brawl ensues, Major is injured but ultimately they achieve victory over 'Nazi spies'.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, embroiled in intrigue against 'Hitler tools' and facing suspicion from local authorities.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and their mission against 'Hitler tools' in a desert setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation in South American Town
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are located in a South American town and confronted by soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: The Americans are detained and questioned about their presence and the President's daughter, Rosita.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre, Mama, and Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces El Tigre and 'Mama', revealing a twist in the Rosita kidnapping case and initiating a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Ride
sub_scenes.description: Men discuss El Tigre, then are forced into a car by a bald armed man.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Entering El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Men plan to approach El Tigre's hideout and prepare to enter under cover of darkness.

sub_scenes.title: Diversion, El Tigre's Reveal, and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: A diversion is used at El Tigre's hideout, El Tigre is revealed, and an interrogation begins.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: News of Rosita's Imprisonment and Rescue Ride
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre learns Rosita is held by Axis agents and orders a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Citadel Escape
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's men assault, while others plan hotel infiltration and seek refuge in a citadel.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Hotel Fight
sub_scenes.description: Rosita is found, and fighting continues within the hotel.

sub_scenes.title: Ongoing Combat and Government Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Fights continue, Rosita is warned of danger, and government troops arrive to intervene.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, engaging in combat, reporting to superiors, and facing orders and bargains.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle and a soldier reports a 'grave matter'.

sub_scenes.title: Disobeyed Order and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: A high-ranking officer is angry about a disobeyed order, and a soldier reassures Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and is ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Orders, and Torture
sub_scenes.description: Captured men are brought before Grauer, forced to write, and threatened with torture.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Justification and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, and a flashback reveals Sam burning and Dolan's cold justification.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification

sub_scenes.title: Grauer's Orders and Burning Huts
sub_scenes.description: Grauer issues dismissive orders amidst the backdrop of burning native huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan ambushes natives, the chief dies, and an unexpected alliance is formed.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's internal conflict, his son Sam's fight, and Dolan's disciplinary action and lesson learned.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Contemplation and Sam's Fight
sub_scenes.description: Captain considers surrendering, reflects on father's duty, and finds his son Sam fighting.

sub_scenes.title: Disciplinary Action and Service Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is disciplined by the Captain but learns a lesson about service.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline featuring the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate a murder case.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Confrontation Setup
sub_scenes.description: A city street scene sets up a potential confrontation, introducing the Twinkle Twins.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: News Office Assignment
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are assigned to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: The Twins visit the police station and then the hospital to investigate Guy and Miss Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Miss Reilly's Blood and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: Miss Reilly's blood type and the need for Farnacci's blood are revealed, prompting a new direction in the investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Twins search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and learn about his sacrifice from Mrs. Murphy.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A taxi ambush occurs, Dan witnesses it and pursues the shooters, leading to a street brawl and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the brawl, hospital transport of injured, anxious waiting at hospital, community blood drive, and Tom Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Lassie's Recovery Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry against Farnacci, police mobilization, pool room investigation, Farnacci's arrest, and celebration of Lassie's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
